result.arabic_text: ثُمَّ لَمۡ تَكُن فِتۡنَتُهُمۡ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُواْ وَٱللَّهِ رَبِّنَا مَا كُنَّا مُشۡرِكِينَ
result.translation: Then they will have no excuse but to say, “By Allah, our Lord, we never associated any partners [with Allah][6].”
result.footnotes: [6] They will falsely swear, thinking they have something to stand on.
